name: Battle Tank (itch) (HartfordGames)
description:
Battle Tank

Survive waves of enemy tanks. Use minimap to visualize enemy location relative to player view.

  • W, A, S, D to move
  • Mouse to rotate player view and aim tank barrel
  • Left click to fire projectile
  • Hold left mouse button to fire and follow projectile
  • Hold right mouse button to slow time and get projectile landing target

Escape / P key to access pause menu (screen resolution, mouse sensitivity).

1 key to toggle and debug frames per second.
